attributes.action: Reinstate The Death Penalty For Murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is now evidence to prove that Violent murder is on the increase.There is no other way to deter these people other than knowing that if they Kill someone they will die,and we ask that the age limit is  from 16 yrs old.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
